name: Frostborne
startIntroPart1: Boreas, Harbinger of Frost and ruler of the Frostborne. Your breath stills the wind and your gaze turns rivers to glass. The world awakens to your eternal winter.
startIntroPart2: Will your empire spread like rime across the earth? Will your rule freeze time itself? Show them, O Frostborn, that the cold is not death — it is dominion.
declaringWar: Your flame will flicker and die beneath the coming frost.
attacked: You strike at ice eternal. It does not shatter — it waits.
defeated: Even glaciers break... but winter always returns.
introduction: I am Boreas, voice of the blizzard. Tread lightly, for you walk frozen ground.
neutralHello: The chill does not bite... unless provoked.
hateHello: You will know true stillness — when your world freezes over.
tradeRequest: A shard of ice can reflect many truths. Let us see what benefit lies between us.
uniques: Comment [Special Units can freeze over any tile, allowing all land units to go over water and reducing movement and sight of enemy units.]
Comment [Special Units are limited to 1 for every city.]
Comment [Capital city gains more stats per every turn. other cities can slowly gain the same buff overtime.]
Comment [[Herald of Everwinter can use [Eternal Freeze], buffing all Land units and buffing all Heralds.]]
Free [Herald of Everwinter] appears <upon constructing [Obelisk of Permafrost]>

civilopediaText.text: The Frostborne are a civilization shaped by endless winter. Led by the enigmatic Boreas, the Frostborne embraces cold not as a curse, but as a source of strength.
The Frostborne start slow but get going later on in the game
You want to quickly spread the frozen tiles around the map as each tile will contribute to your cities gaining more stats.

civilopediaText.test: Snow type tiles also count toward the stat bonus but they need to be in your borders to count

name: Coleopteran Swarm
startIntroPart1: Tayzzyronth, Seedmind of the Coleopteran Swarm. From spore to spire, your children multiply without end. The roots writhe beneath foreign soil.
startIntroPart2: Will you consume all in your path? Will your hive eclipse the stars? Prove to them: what grows cannot be killed — it only spreads.
introduction: I am Tayzzyronth, voice of the Many. Your biomass will serve us well.
neutralHello: Stillness is inefficient. We prefer motion. And growth.
hateHello: The Swarm blooms — and you are in the way.
tradeRequest: Exchange strengthens nodes. Offer what you can. We will grow it.
uniques: Comment [Cannot control or build Cities or build any units.]
Comment [Cannot do research or gain policies on its own.]
Comment [Starts with a [Swarm Mother] which spawns swarmlings.]

civilopediaText.text: The Coleopteran Swarm is not a nation — it is a directive. Propagation is their law, From desert cracks to city ruins, they grow. Every death feeds the Swarm. Every enemy is an opportunity for more.
The Swarm must be aggresive yet cautious, the death of the [Swarm Mother] means the death of the swarm
You want quickly find a way to evolve your swarm queen to quickly swarm your enemies

civilopediaText.test: Each existing swarmling will slowly drain your [Biomass], ensure that you have enough to feed your army or your swarm will slowly die and gain debuffs
